requests.name: api/user/profile
requests.description:
this is to view user profile:
     
     the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>
the parameters passed to the body...
       'token'=>required
     
     
          on success:
            'user'=>user details ,
            'image_directory'=>file directory,

requests.name: api/user/login
requests.description:
this is to login a user:
the parameters passed to the body...
     
     'email' => 'required|email|unique:users',
            'password' => 'required|string|min:6|max:10',
            
          on success:
            'success' => true,
            'data' => token

requests.name: api/user/register
requests.description:
this is to register a new user:
the parameters passed to the body...
   'firstname' => 'required|string',
            'lastname'=>'required|string',
            'email' => 'required|email|unique:users',
            'password' => 'required|string|min:6|max:10',
            'phone'=>'required|string',
            'cityid'=>'required|string',
            'occupationid'=>'required|string',
            'rating'=>'required|integer',
            'profilephoto.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000',
           
          on success:
            'success' => true,
            'data' => token

requests.name: api/user/edit/:id
requests.description:
this is to update a user only the users email is not added during edit:
the parameters passed to the body...
     
     the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>
     
     'firstname' => 'required|string',
            'lastname'=>'required|string',
            'password' => 'required|string|min:6|max:10',
            'phone'=>'required|string',
            'cityid'=>'required|string',
            'occupationid'=>'required|string',
            'rating'=>'required|integer',
            'roleid'=>'required|string',
            'profilephoto.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000',
     
          on success:
            'success' => true,
            'data' => token

requests.name: api/user/logout
requests.description:
this is to logout a user:
the parameters passed to the body...
     
     'token'=>required
            
          on success:
            'success' => true,
            'data' => 'user logged out successfully'
